Package org.criteria4jpa.projection

Interface Summary
Projection Interface describing a projection that can be added to a Criteria.
 

Class Summary
CountProjection Class representing a "count" projection.
DistinctProjection Class representing a "distinct" projection.
FunctionProjection Class representing projection based on a function.
PathProjection Simple class for all projections that refer to a persistent field or a single-valued relationship field using a path expression.
ProjectionList Simple class for projection lists that wrap other projections.
Projections Factory class for Projection instances that can be added to a criteria by calling Criteria.setProjection(Projection).
RootEntityProjection Simple projection that refers project to the entity of the root criteria of the criteria hierarchy.
